greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of proper divisors of n of the form 2^k + 1 for k >= 0.
comment: a(n) is the number of terms of A000051 less than n that divide n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Table[DivisorSum[n, 1 &, And[IntegerQ@ Log2[# - 1], # < n] &], {n, 105}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jun 11 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 11 2018
